text.p: Thank you for visiting this digital edition of Blake/An Illustrated Quarterly.
If you have any questions about the journal itself, please contact the managing editor, Sarah Jones.
We welcome any comments or suggestions you may have about this digital archive.

Please be certain to include the name of the journal (or the abbreviation BIQ) in your subject line, and to sign your comments with a valid return email address, included in the body—and not just the header—of your message; if you do not receive a reply to a question or comment, it’s because we’ve been unable to contact you.
